name: Untitled Medieval Game Demo
description:
This game is full of enemies to fight with a smooth combat system and plenty of missions to complete. THIS GAME IS IN ACTIVE DEVELOPMENT AND IS A VERY EARLY PROTOTYPE VERSION. CONTROLLER HIGHLY RECOMMENDED. Controls are in the read me.txt. Great ragdoll physics. Changelog in README.txt.

CONTROLS:

WASD:MOVE

MOUSE:LOOK

Q:BLOCK

SPACE:JUMP

TAB:LOCK ON/OFF TARGET

LEFT MOUSE:USE WEAPON

RIGHT MOUSE:SHEATHE WEAPON

E:PICKUP SWORD.
